entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023
